==Vietnamese==

===Han character===
{{vi-hantu|[[bạc]], [[bạch]]|rs=金05}}

# [[silver]]

====Compounds====
* {{l|vi|錢鉑|tr=[[tiền bạc]]}}
* {{l|vi|紙鉑|tr=[[giấy bạc]]}}
* {{l|vi|銅鉑|tr=[[đồng bạc]]}}

====Usage notes====
* Chữ Nôm. The modern Vietnamese word for silver is [[bạc]].
* This character only means silver in Vietnamese chữ Nôm. In Chinese, this character means [[platinum]]. [[銀]] means silver in Chinese and Japanese.
